updates.title: Lease Signed & Building Phase Launched
updates.description: We officially secured the Sta. Rosa Town Center space and prayed over the new location. Teams immediately began prepping the site and scheduling volunteer crews.

updates.title: Volunteer Demolition Weekend
updates.description: PID coaches, cell leaders, and volunteers filled sacks with rubble, removed old walls, and cleared the mezzanine so contractors can move quickly.

updates.title: Steel Framing Materials Delivered
updates.description: Metal studs and structural frames arrived on site. Fabrication for the stage, lobby counters, and tech booth begins this week.
